description:
Hotel Management & Consulting is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Regional Director of Operations to oversee our extended stay hotel operations for 30 plus hotel locations on the West Coast through the Mid-West including AZ, CA, IA, ID, KS, MO, MT, NE, NM, TX, UT, and WA.

As a Regional Director of Operations, you will be responsible for managing and leading a team of District Manager professionals, driving business growth, and ensuring operational excellence. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in operations management, strategic planning, and business development. This position requires 75% plus overnight travel and remote work.

Benefits of working with us:

  • Competitive salary range of $115,000 - $135,000 commensurate with experience
  • Opportunity for bonuses
  • Medical, dental, vision, and 401K benefits
  • Complimentary Employee Assistance Program
  • Paid time off
  • We have partnered with DailyPay, which is a voluntary benefit that offers employees access to their pay on their own schedule


Duties:

  • Provide leadership and guidance to district managers and hotel teams, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and objectives
  • Develop and implement strategic plans to drive business growth and achieve targets
  • Manage and optimize regional operations to ensure efficiency and effectiveness
  • Lead the development and execution of business development initiatives to expand market presence
  • Oversee the implementation of process improvement initiatives to enhance operational efficiency
  • Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to track regional performance and identify areas for improvement
  • Collaborate with senior leadership to develop and execute regional strategies
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, ownership groups, partners, and regulatory bodies
  • Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Proven experience in a senior leadership role, preferably as a Regional Director of Operations or similar position within the extended stay segment
  • Strong background in operations management, including experience in managing multiple locations or regions
  • Demonstrated ability to negotiate contracts and agreements with clients and partners Exceptional leadership skills with the ability to inspire and motivate teams towards achieving goals
  • Strategic thinker with the ability to develop and execute effective business strategies
  • Experience in business development, including identifying new opportunities and driving revenue growth
  • Proficient in project management methodologies, with the ability to oversee complex projects from initiation to completion
  • Track record of successfully implementing process improvement initiatives to enhance operational efficiency
  • Valid Driver’s License


If you are a dynamic leader with a proven track record in driving business growth and operational excellence, we invite you to apply for the position of Regional Director. Join our team and make a significant impact on our organization's success.
